page.title: 02CARE OF THE ELDERLY
page.content:
There is good provision for the elderly in this area, which has a large number of retired people. Facilities include sheltered accommodation with resident House Mothers, private nursing homes and the Cottage Hospital.
A small group visited the{Lear {House,}which 3 years ago became an "extra-care home".
There are 12 residents, the youngest is 74 - the oldest is 90. They enjoy music, whist and bingo and celebrate special events with parties. There is a flower garden and fruit and vegetables are grown too. There are 6 attendants, 3 night staff and 2 cleaners. Emergency lights in the office can be operated from all rooms to call for help.
